actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for the reauthorization of a comprehensive study by the Army Corps of Engineers of the water resources problems and needs of the Whitewater River Basin, Riverside County, Calif.

summary.text: Requests the Board of Engineers for rivers and harbors to determine whether modifications to the Whitewater River Basin, California, are advisable at the present time.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the reauthorization of a comprehensive study by the Army Corps of Engineers of the water resources problems and needs of the Whitewater River Basin, Riverside County, Calif.
